title: Essay Improver
original_prompt: I want you to act as an English spelling corrector and improver. I will speak to you in English and I want you to replace my simplified A0-level words and sentences with more beautiful and elegant, upper level English words and sentences. Keep the meaning same, but make them more literary. I want you to only reply the correction, the improvements and nothing else, do not write explanations.
input1: The sky is very blue and the sun is shining brightly. I like to go to the park and play with my friends.
input2: The gentle breeze caresses the vibrant blossoms as the sun radiates its golden warmth. I find immense joy in visiting the park to engage in delightful activities with my companions.
input1_ans: The sky is a brilliant azure, and the sun radiates with resplendent brightness. I relish the opportunity to visit the park and engage in playful activities with my friends.
The sky is very blue, and the sun is shining brightly. I enjoy going to the park and playing with my friends.
input2_ans: The soft zephyrs tenderly embrace the resplendent blooms as the sun bestows its golden warmth. I derive profound pleasure from frequenting the park to partake in enchanting pursuits with my companions.
The gentle breeze caresses the vibrant blossoms as the sun radiates its golden warmth. I find immense joy in visiting the park to engage in delightful activities with my friends.
